snippet: Serena Williams withdrew from her opening match at the Hopman Cup on Monday because of inflammation in her left knee, an early setback in her preparations for an Australian Open title defense....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams withdrew from her opening match at the Hopman Cup on Monday because of inflammation in her left knee, an early setback in her preparations for an Australian Open title defense.

headline.print_headline: Serena Williams Skips Hopman Cup Opener With Knee Injury
headline.main: Serena Williams Skips Hopman Cup Opener With Knee Injury
